title: Apple and white wine chicken with butternut squash
ingredients: ['4 chicken breast fillets', '1/4 butternut squash, cubed', '1 medium red onion, chopped', '1 small eating apple (e.g. Braeburn), peeled and sliced', '1 vegetable stock cube', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon coarsely ground black pepper', '330ml boiling water', '125ml white wine (Chardonnay works well)']
